value:
$WmMPID_魔王リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Dark,Face|Hmph! Keep your wretched hands
off me, human, or you may well
lose them.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hmm... Hmmmm...$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|...What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|It's just that...I feel as though we've
met before... I felt similarly when
I first met Peony.$k$pYou don't happen to remember
having met me before, do you,
Mirabilis?$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Zzzz... Mmm...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Hey!$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|*yyyaaawwwnnn*$k$pI'm sorry... You were saying
you've met me before? In a
dream? ...Maybe?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Yes. I have this growing feeling that
I've spoken with all you ljósálfar
before, just like this...$k$pWhen I was a child... I remember the
dream. It was always the same. We
all played in a field of flowers.$k$pOne girl who looked like Peony,
one like Mirabilis... And I seem to
recall there being two others...$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Hmm... Time passes differently
for ljósálfar and humans...$k$pIf we had met, though, that is how
it would have happened...$k$pBut that doesn't matter now. What's
important is that I just...close my
eyes...and... Zzzz...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|I-it doesn't matter?$k$pI feel like us girls, we did something
together... Something that felt
important somehow...$k$pWere we playing at being on some
kind of adventure...to save the world?$k$pHmm... Ugh. I can't remember...
C'mon, Sharena, think!$k$p$Sbs150|
